summary: THE FORCE REQUIRED TO TURN THE STEERING WHEEL WAS EXCESSIVE.  *MR *TS   *NLM    WHILE DRIVING,  AS RESULT OF HIGH EFFORT STEERING IT CAUSED THE DRIVER TO EXERT MORE FORCE IN STEERING THE VEHICLE, THAN THE BODY WAS CAPABLE OF WITHSTANDING. CHEVROLET HAS NOT FIXED PROBLEM AS OF YET.  FURTHER INVESTIGATIONS ARE OCCURRING.   *CB   *JB
